title: Query different files with external tables
sql:
select * from external_table
  external modify ( 
    location ( 'first_file.txt' ) 
  );
  
C1                  
--------------------
first file records

select * from external_table
  external modify ( 
    location ( 'second_file.txt' ) 
  );
  
C1                  
--------------------
second file records
